name: XCredit
description: We want to build a credit building system that incentives individuals to build credit by doing their day to day activities. We take into account rent, utilities, dinner, concert tickets, etc. to help secure financial stability for people.
one_liner: We want to build a credit building system that incentives individuals to build credit by doing their day to day activities. We take into account rent, utilities, dinner, concert tickets, etc. to help secure financial stability for people.
